control_attributes.Control: SI-7 (5) AUTOMATED RESPONSE TO INTEGRITY VIOLATIONS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system automatically [Selection (one or more): shuts the information system down; restarts the information system; implements [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards]] when integrity violations are discovered.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization incorporates the detection of unauthorized [Assignment: organization-defined security-relevant changes to the information system] into the organizational incident response capability.

Control Statement: The information system automatically [Selection (one or more): shuts the information system down; restarts the information system; implements [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards]] when integrity violations are discovered.
Control Name: SI-7 (5) AUTOMATED RESPONSE TO INTEGRITY VIOLATIONS
